params.name: script
params.description: **Required** The script that the hook runs.

params.name: script_repository
params.description: **Required** The GitHub repository where the script is kept.

params.name: environment
params.description: **Required** The pre-receive environment where the script is executed.

params.name: enforcement
params.description: The state of enforcement for this hook. default: `disabled`

params.name: allow_downstream_configuration
params.description: Whether enforcement can be overridden at the org or repo level. default: `false`
